sentences.sentence: Most of us can’t tell our secant from our cotangent.
sentences.translation: 我们中的大多数不能分辨正切余切。

sentences.sentence: Most of us can't tell our secant from our cotangent.
sentences.translation: 我们中的大多数不能分辨正切余切。

sentences.sentence: A secant is defined as line passing through two points of the curve.
sentences.translation: 割线的定义是一条通过曲线上两点的直线。
